description: This file is the main index.html for a web-based database viewer application. It contains HTML markup, CSS styles, and embedded JavaScript logic for browsing databases, tables, and viewing data, including functions for fetching data from backend APIs, rendering tables, and handling user interactions.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of databases from the API and displays them in the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the list of databases by re-fetching from the API.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses the list of tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches tables for a selected database and displays them.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches data for a selected table and renders it as an HTML table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Creates an HTML table from data array and inserts it into the container.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Returns HTML for a table cell based on the cell's value, handling objects and long strings.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content to show full data.
